channel.title: United States of America on Liam Getreu
channel.description: Recent content in United States of America on Liam Getreu

item.title: NIF event: What the Biden-Harris Administration Means for the Middle East
item.description: Less than two weeks after President Joe Biden took office, I interviewed seasoned American Middle East negotiator, and NIF board member, Aaron David Miller and former Knesset member Ksenia Svetlova about how America’s Middle East policy will shift under the new administration.

item.title: NIF event: Democracy in Danger
item.description: With democracy and pluralism under attack around the world, I interviewed New York Times columnist Roger Cohen and academic and former deputy Knesset speaker Naomi Chazan to delve further into this troubling trend in the United States, Israel and all around the world.

item.title: NIF event: Interviewing Thomas Friedman
item.description: This week I interviewed New York Times columnist Thomas Friedman about the US election, the Trump presidency and the Middle East.

item.title: NIF event: In conversation with Martin Indyk
item.description: With Prime Minister Netanyahu actively advancing plans to annex parts of the West Bank and President Trump pushing his own plan for the Middle East, I interviewed former US ambassador to Israel and former US special envoy for Israeli-Palestinian negotiations – not to mention NIF Australia’s co-patron!

item.title: Discussing the Trump deal, Israeli annexation, elections and President Rivlin’s visit to Australia on ABC News
item.description: The White House has hailed the Middle East peace plan the "deal of the century", but Palestinian leaders are calling it a conspiracy - @liamget from @NIFAustralia tells @bevvo14 whether the deal could lead to more conflict.
